drops.name: Hydra bones
drops.quantity: 1<!-- Regular hydras only drop one set of bones. If you are changing this to 2, you might be confusing this page with Alchemical Hydra.-->

drops.name: Dragon thrownaxe
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group="d" name="hydradragon">1/2,000 while on a hydra [[slayer assignment]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Munro|url=https://twitter.com/JagexMunro/status/1095752074099339264|date=13 Feb 2019|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/bc5mT|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=As I mentioned on the Q & A, here are the pictures of the drop rates for various parts of Kebos. This time with the correct drop rate for the pieces of the Brimstone Ring.|name=Alchemical Hydra}}
